activity.title: beckn/no-code-ui-builder#1
activity.text:
Hi @ravi-prakash-v ,

I'm Ashutosh Sharma, a pre-final year student at NIT Agartala. I’ve been working on AI/ML and web development projects, and your no-code Beckn UI tool really caught my attention. I love the idea of making Beckn-based apps more accessible, especially for non-developers.

I'd really like to contribute to this project. Here's how I think I can help:

* Work on the AI-driven natural language input to UI generation pipeline (I’ve used OpenAI APIs before).
* Help build the drag-and-drop state machine UI using React.
* Set up modular support so different sectors (retail, energy, etc.) can be added easily.
* Contribute to the Beckn Protocol integration side as well — I'm currently learning how the flow (`search`, `select`, `init`, etc.) works.

I’m also happy to help with designing mockups or setting up a basic workflow editor. If you have any roadmap or a list of issues to start with, I’d be glad to pick one up.

 Email: [ashu3002sharma@gmail.com](ashu3002sharma@gmail.com)
 LinkedIn: [Ashutosh Sharma](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ashutosh-sharma-6886402b1/)

Let me know if there’s any Slack/Discord/community where contributors hang out — I’d love to join and collaborate with others!

Thanks,
Ashutosh Sharma
